original_text: I will punish the people who have come to live in Egypt. War, famine or disease will kill them, in the way that I punished the people of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 내가 예루살렘을 벌한 것 같이 애굽 땅에 사는 자들을 칼과 기근과 전염병으로 벌하리니

sentences.original_text: who have come to live in Egypt
War, famine or disease will kill them
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁, 기근이나 질병이 그들을 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the way that I punished
